member.name: T:ConsoleInk.Ansi
member.summary: Provides common ANSI escape code constants for terminal formatting. Reference: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code#SGR_(Select_Graphic_Rendition)_parameters

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.Reset
member.summary: Resets all attributes to their default state.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.Bold
member.summary: Applies bold (increased intensity) style.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.Faint
member.summary: Applies faint (decreased intensity) style. (Not widely supported)

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.Italic
member.summary: Applies italic style. (Not widely supported)

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.Underline
member.summary: Applies underline style.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.SlowBlink
member.summary: Applies slow blink style. (Not widely supported)

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.RapidBlink
member.summary: Applies rapid blink style. (Not widely supported)

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.ReverseVideo
member.summary: Swaps foreground and background colors.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.Conceal
member.summary: Hides text. (Not widely supported)

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.Strikethrough
member.summary: Applies strikethrough style. (Not widely supported)

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BoldOff
member.summary: Turns off bold and faint styles.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.ItalicOff
member.summary: Turns off italic style.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.UnderlineOff
member.summary: Turns off underline style.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BlinkOff
member.summary: Turns off blink style.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.ReverseVideoOff
member.summary: Turns off reverse video style.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.ConcealOff
member.summary: Turns off conceal style.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.StrikethroughOff
member.summary: Turns off strikethrough style.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBlack
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Black.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgRed
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Red.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgGreen
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Green.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgYellow
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Yellow.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBlue
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Blue.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgMagenta
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Magenta.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgCyan
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Cyan.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgWhite
member.summary: Sets foreground color to White.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgDefault
member.summary: Resets foreground color to the default.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBrightBlack
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Bright Black (Gray).

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBrightRed
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Bright Red.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBrightGreen
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Bright Green.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBrightYellow
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Bright Yellow.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBrightBlue
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Bright Blue.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBrightMagenta
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Bright Magenta.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBrightCyan
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Bright Cyan.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgBrightWhite
member.summary: Sets foreground color to Bright White.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBlack
member.summary: Sets background color to Black.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgRed
member.summary: Sets background color to Red.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgGreen
member.summary: Sets background color to Green.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgYellow
member.summary: Sets background color to Yellow.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBlue
member.summary: Sets background color to Blue.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgMagenta
member.summary: Sets background color to Magenta.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgCyan
member.summary: Sets background color to Cyan.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgWhite
member.summary: Sets background color to White.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgDefault
member.summary: Resets background color to the default.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBrightBlack
member.summary: Sets background color to Bright Black (Gray).

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBrightRed
member.summary: Sets background color to Bright Red.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBrightGreen
member.summary: Sets background color to Bright Green.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBrightYellow
member.summary: Sets background color to Bright Yellow.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBrightBlue
member.summary: Sets background color to Bright Blue.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBrightMagenta
member.summary: Sets background color to Bright Magenta.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBrightCyan
member.summary: Sets background color to Bright Cyan.

member.name: F:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgBrightWhite
member.summary: Sets background color to Bright White.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgColor256(System.Byte)
member.summary: Generates the ANSI escape code for a 256-color palette foreground color.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgColor256(System.Byte)
member.summary: Generates the ANSI escape code for a 256-color palette background color.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.Ansi.FgColorTrue(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Generates the ANSI escape code for a 24-bit ("true color") foreground color.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.Ansi.BgColorTrue(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Generates the ANSI escape code for a 24-bit ("true color") background color.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.Ansi.HyperlinkStart(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates the OSC 8 sequence to start a hyperlink.
member.returns: The ANSI escape sequence to start the hyperlink.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.Ansi.HyperlinkEnd
member.summary: Generates the OSC 8 sequence to end a hyperlink.
member.returns: The ANSI escape sequence to end the hyperlink.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.Ansi.GetColorCode(System.Nullable{System.ConsoleColor},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the ANSI escape sequence for a standard System.ConsoleColor.
member.param: The ConsoleColor to get the code for.
True for foreground color, false for background color.
member.returns: The ANSI escape sequence string, or an empty string if color is null.

member.name: T:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme
member.summary: Defines the color and styling theme for Markdown rendering.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Default
member.summary: Gets the default theme with standard console colors.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Monochrome
member.summary: Gets a theme that uses no color, relying only on default foreground/background.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading1Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for Level 1 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading1Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the ANSI style code(s) for Level 1 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading2Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for Level 2 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading2Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the ANSI style code(s) for Level 2 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading3Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for Level 3 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading3Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the ANSI style code(s) for Level 3 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading4Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for Level 4 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading5Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for Level 5 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.Heading6Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for Level 6 Headings.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.LinkForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color for link text.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.LinkTextStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the complete ANSI style code(s) applied to link text (e.g., includes color and underline).

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.LinkUrlStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the complete ANSI style code(s) applied to link URLs (often dimmed).

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.LinkBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for link text (null for default).

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.LinkUnderline
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether link text should be underlined (redundant if LinkTextStyle includes underline).

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.CodeForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color for code blocks.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.CodeBlockStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the complete ANSI style code(s) applied to fenced code blocks.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.CodeBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for code blocks (null for default).

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.BlockquoteColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for the blockquote marker and/or text.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.HorizontalRuleColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for horizontal rules.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.ListBulletColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for list bullets/numbers.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.BlockquotePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix string used for blockquotes (before styling).

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.HorizontalRuleChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to draw horizontal rules.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.UnorderedListPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix used for unordered list items.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.OrderedListPrefixFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format string for ordered list item prefixes ({0} is replaced by the number).

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.InlineCodeStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the complete ANSI style code(s) for inline code spans.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.BlockquoteMarkerStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style for the blockquote marker (e.g., '>'). Defaults to Dim styling.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.BlockquoteMarker
member.summary: Gets or sets the marker character(s) used for blockquotes. Defaults to "> ".

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.ImageAltTextStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style applied to the alt text of an image. Defaults to Dim styling.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.ImagePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix added before the alt text of an image. Defaults to "[Image: ".

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.ImageSuffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the suffix added after the alt text of an image. Defaults to "]".

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.TaskListUncheckedMarker
member.summary: Gets or sets the marker string used for an unchecked task list item. Defaults to "[ ] ".

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.TaskListCheckedMarker
member.summary: Gets or sets the marker string used for a checked task list item. Defaults to "[x] ".

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.BoldStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the ANSI style code(s) for bold emphasis.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.ItalicStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the ANSI style code(s) for italic emphasis.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.StrikethroughStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the ANSI style code(s) for strikethrough emphasis.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.ConsoleTheme.CreateMonochromeTheme
member.summary: Creates a monochrome theme instance.

member.name: T:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsole
member.summary: Provides static helper methods for rendering Markdown directly to the console or a string.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsole.Render(System.String,ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions)
member.summary: Renders the specified Markdown text to a string with ANSI escape codes.
member.returns: A string containing the rendered output with ANSI codes.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsole.Render(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter,ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions)
member.summary: Renders the specified Markdown text directly to the provided TextWriter.
member.param: The TextWriter to write the formatted output to.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsole.Render(System.IO.TextReader,System.IO.TextWriter,ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions)
member.summary: Renders Markdown content read from a TextReader to the specified TextWriter.
member.param: The TextReader providing the Markdown content.
The TextWriter to write the formatted output to.

member.name: T:ConsoleInk.MarkdownBlockType
member.summary: Represents the type of Markdown block currently being processed.

member.name: T:ConsoleInk.ColumnAlignment
member.summary: Specifies text alignment within a table column.

member.name: T:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter
member.summary: A TextWriter implementation that processes Markdown input incrementally and writes formatted output to an underlying TextWriter (typically Console.Out).

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.Encoding
member.summary: Gets the encoding for this writer (defaults to the output writer's encoding).

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter,ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions,System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The underlying TextWriter to write formatted output to.
Optional action to receive detailed logging messages.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter._log(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to safely invoke the logger.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.Write(System.Char)
member.summary: Writes a single character to the writer. Characters are buffered line by line for processing.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a string to the writer.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a string followed by a line terminator to the writer.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.WriteLine
member.summary: Writes a line terminator to the writer.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.ApplyStyle(System.String)
member.summary: Applies an ANSI style code if colors are enabled.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.ResetCurrentStyle
member.summary: Resets the last applied ANSI style if colors are enabled. More sophisticated reset logic might be needed for nested styles.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.Complete
member.summary: Signals that all input has been written and any final processing or cleanup should occur. If not called explicitly, this method will be called automatically by Dispose. Subsequent calls after the first have no effect.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the . Calls if it hasn't been called explicitly.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizer to ensure resources are released even if Dispose wasn't called.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.WriteAsync(System.Char)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a character to the text string or stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.WriteAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a string to the text string or stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.WriteLineAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a string followed by a line terminator to the text string or stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.WriteLineAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a line terminator to the text string or stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.FlushAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownConsoleWriter.Flush
member.summary: Clears all buffers for this writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

member.name: T:ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions
member.summary: Provides options for configuring Markdown rendering behavior.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions.ConsoleWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width (in characters) to use for word wrapping. Defaults to Console.WindowWidth if available, otherwise 80.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions.EnableColors
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ANSI color codes should be included in the output. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets the theme to use for styling. Defaults to ConsoleTheme.Default.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions.StripHtml
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether raw HTML tags should be stripped from the output. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions.UseHyperlinks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether links should be rendered using OSC 8 hyperlink escape sequences. If false (default), links are rendered with standard ANSI styling (color/underline). If true, links are rendered as clickable hyperlinks in supported terminals.

member.name: M:ConsoleInk.MarkdownRenderOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.
